body: In your build directory you should see a file `TARGET/libgo/internal/race.gox`, which is the export file for the `internal/race` package.  That file is not installed, because subdirectories of `internal` may not be imported from outside the standard library (see https://golang.org/cmd/go/#hdr-Internal_Directories), but `race.gox` is built and may be imported by packages in the standard library.
